resources:
Take A Stand Settings Tap to Start Tap to Stop Time to Stand Time to stand up Time to Stand Up
Good job!
Way to go!
Excellent!
Good Job! Select Frequency (Minutes) Open Closed " minutes ago" " minute ago" " minutes" " minute" Take A Stand Schedule is Running Alarm day is over. "Schedule " New Title OK Cancel Schedule Running Settings Stand Reminder Frequency Set Default Notification Schedules am pm LED Light Vibrate Sound Next Alert At: Stood Delay Frequency Start Time End Time S M T W T F S Stand Reminder Frequency Calibration To calibrate, the phone must be in your pocket and you must be sitting. The phone will Vibrate once, indicating you should stand. Once calibration is complete, the phone will vibrate again. Once you press OK, you will have 5 seconds to put the phone in your pocket and be sitting before you feel the first vibration. No stand reminder schedules yet \n \n Click to Add Vibrate on silent Repeat notification when it is time to stand Every Notification Reminder Frequency Reminder Settings\ If pausing for a set time, the next reminder will happen your default frequency minutes after the paused time has passed (20 minute frequency and 30 minute pause = next stand reminder in 50 minutes) Paused until: Pause Time (Minutes) Paused Step Detection Wear Step Counter (StandDtector JR™) StandDtector™ Calibrate Stands Uses device\'s built in pedometer to detect the last time you walked, so that you are only reminded to stand after you have been sitting for a while. Uses your wearable\'s pedometer to ensure you are only reminded after 20 minutes of inactivity
